summary: There are plenty of EPIC houses, but when I got Leveler\'s Tower, it was pretty legit.... But there was never enough to feel full! This mods gives you every item in the game, so you can fill the chests as soon as you walk in the front door.
descriptionHtml:
I was looking around at mods, and I had heard a LOT about Leveler\'s Tower. I never liked it, but I just saw the main image of a boring tower. I didn\'t know about the massive understories!
  So, I got it immediately. As soon as I entered, I was AMAZED! However, I usually sell my items, so I 
didn\'t have much to put in. It was mega empty.

  After about an hour and a half of copying and pasting, I ended up making this! It\'s a bat command that gives you all the items in the game. When you enter the tower, enter:
  bat allitems

  And then, once you\'re in the sorting area (it looks like a candy factory, in my opinion), press the big button, and voila! You\'ve officially filled the tower! I prefer to use the code a LOT at once, so that way I have a really massive inventory.

  Please note not to use it on the field, as any loading screen will be hella long, and probably a CTD from overloading. Only in the first room of the tower!
author: kailp
